#id=1
#text=I prefer showers but sometimes you just need to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=Showers are good for when you are really dirty and need to get cleaned fast but baths are more leisurely and relaxing .
#id=3
#text=First I go in the bathroom and put a stopper in the bathtub to stop the water from running out .
#id=4
#text=Then I start the water to fill up the tub .
#id=5
#text=I also make sure it is just right , not too hot or cold .
#id=6
#text=Then I get my face cloth and a great big bar of soap .
#id=7
#text=If I feel playful I will grab a couple water toys to play with .
#id=8
#text=Then I slip -LRB- off my clothes and slip into the tub .
#id=9
#text=I fill the tub really high so only my head sticks out above the water .
#text=I like the hot water all over me .
#text=I will spend an hour soaking in the tub .
#text=I will sit there till my fingers get all shrivelled and pruney .
#text=Then I use my toes to take out the stopper and sit there till the water all drains away .
